title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 1001.7 - Exhibit 7: natural gas power facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 1001.7 - Exhibit 7: natural gas power facilities

State Regulations

If the applicant's proposal is for a gas power facility, Exhibit 7 shall contain: (a) An
estimate of the monthly and hourly gas usage by the facility. (b) A statement of the gas pressure required
for the gas turbines and how the pressure will be regulated or
increased. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
1001.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
